【直播預告】蓬佩奧重要演講 紀念柏林墙倒塌

07 Nov 2019, 20:32

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月08日訊】美國國務卿蓬佩奧（Mike Pompeo）將在柏林標誌性的勃蘭登堡門發表重要演講，紀念柏林牆倒塌30周年。新唐人電視台和《大紀元時報》將進行網絡直播，並有同聲翻譯。請鎖定新聞直播間。
11月9日是柏林牆倒塌30周年，德國首都柏林準備了一週的隆重紀念活動。美國國務卿蓬佩奧11月6-8日訪問德國，與德國主要領導人會晤，並共同紀念東歐、中歐人民擺脫共產主義枷鎖的重要歷史時刻。
路透報導，蓬佩奧將於當地時間8日上午10:45（美東凌晨4:45）在柏林標誌性的勃蘭登堡門發表演講，主題為「關於持續捍衛自由國家和自由人民的必要性」。

美東時間：11月8日（週五）早4:45開始（中港台時間：11月9日17:45開始）

[Live preview] Pompeo's important speech to commemorate the fall of the Berlin Wall

07 Nov 2019, 20:32

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 08, 2019] US Secretary of State Mike Pompeo will deliver an important speech at the iconic Brandenburg Gate in Berlin to commemorate the 30th anniversary of the fall of the Berlin Wall. The NTDTV and the Epoch Times will be webcast live and have simultaneous translations. Please lock the news live room.
On November 9th, the 30th anniversary of the fall of the Berlin Wall, the German capital Berlin prepared a week of grand commemoration. US Secretary of State Pompeo visited Germany on November 6-8 to meet with the main German leaders and jointly commemorate the important historical moments of the people of Eastern Europe and Central Europe from the shackles of communism.
Reuters reported that Pompeo will deliver a speech at Berlin's iconic Brandenburg Gate at 10:45 am local time (4:45 am local time) on the theme of "Continuous Defence of Free Country and Free People" "."
